txt.en: This dark crystal is cold to the touch and sends chills down your spine. It may have something to do with how the Cuthraul were summoned to Gwyllion's Gate to begin with.\n\nSaeradan will likely wish to see this crystal.
Saeradan shudders as he touches the crystal.\n\n'Alas! This foul crystal bears the taint of morgul! Someone of great power in service of the Enemy was responsible for summoning these spirits!'
You found this dark crystal at the place where you had banished a Cuthraul.
Bring the dark crystal to Saeradan at Echad Saeradan
Saeradan is at Echad Saeradan, south-west of Gavar Cadlus.\n\nYou should bring the crystal to Saeradan for identification.
